summary: Evil sorceress Zelda kidnaps the Swan Princess in order to wreak havoc on the peaceful land of Swan Lake.
cast: Michelle Nicastro|Brian Nissen|Katja Zoch|Joseph Medrano|Christy Landers|Donald Sage Mackay|Doug Stone|Steve Vinovich|Paul Masonson|Owen Miller|Sean Wright
title: La princesa cisne III: El misterio del reino encantado
